ca.josephroque.bowlingcompanion.utilities

Class DataFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.josephroque.bowlingcompanion.utilities.DataFormatter

  • public final class DataFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Joseph Roque on 15-03-17.

    Provides methods to convert various formatted data into different formats.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String formattedDateToPrettyCompact(java.lang.String formattedDate)
      Converts string of the form "YYYY-mm-DD" to a cleaner format, where YYYY stands for the year, mm stands for the month and DD stands for the day.
      static java.lang.String getHexColorFromInt(int color)
      Converts an integer color into hexadecimal.
      static int getPixelsFromDP(float scale, int dps)
      Converts a dp value to pixels.
      static java.lang.String intToMonthCompact(int month)
      Given an integer from 1-12, returns a 3-4 character string representing that month.
      static int monthToInt(java.lang.String strMonth)
      Returns an index from 1-12 representing the month which was passed.
      static int[] prettyCompactToFormattedDate(java.lang.String pretty)
      Converts a string containing a pretty formatted date into numerical values representing month, day, year (in that order).

    • Method Detail

      • formattedDateToPrettyCompact

        public static java.lang.String formattedDateToPrettyCompact(java.lang.String formattedDate)
        Converts string of the form "YYYY-mm-DD" to a cleaner format, where YYYY stands for the year, mm stands for the month and DD stands for the day.
        Parameters:
        formattedDate - formatted string to be converted
        Returns:
        prettier format of string with full month name

      • getHexColorFromInt

        public static java.lang.String getHexColorFromInt(int color)
        Converts an integer color into hexadecimal.
        Parameters:
        color - integer value of color
        Returns:
        hexadecimal value of color

      • getPixelsFromDP

        public static int getPixelsFromDP(float scale,
                                  int dps)
        Converts a dp value to pixels.
        Parameters:
        scale - density of screen
        dps - value to be converted
        Returns:
        result of conversion from dps to pixels

      • intToMonthCompact

        public static java.lang.String intToMonthCompact(int month)
        Given an integer from 1-12, returns a 3-4 character string representing that month.
        Parameters:
        month - value representing one of 12 months
        Returns:
        3-4 character string representing month, or null if month is not between 1 and 12 (inclusive).

      • monthToInt

        public static int monthToInt(java.lang.String strMonth)
        Returns an index from 1-12 representing the month which was passed.
        Parameters:
        strMonth - string containing at least first 3 letters of a month
        Returns:
        index from 1-12 if strMonth represents a month, -1 otherwise

      • prettyCompactToFormattedDate

        public static int[] prettyCompactToFormattedDate(java.lang.String pretty)
        Converts a string containing a pretty formatted date into numerical values representing month, day, year (in that order).
        Parameters:
        pretty - string formatted by formattedDateToPrettyCompact
        Returns:
        month, day, year of pretty (in that order)
